title: PMS 2.0 357 - Carson Wentz Is Officially A Colt, Adam Thielen, Marcus Peters, Ty Dillion, & AJ Hawk
description: On today's show, AJ Hawk guest hosts in studio, but Pat FaceTimes in to react to the news that Carson Wentz is officially coming to the Colts for a 3rd round pick and a 2nd round pick that conditionally could become a 1st. Joining Pat and AJ on the show is 2x Pro Bowler, All-Pro, one of the best WR's in the NFL, and friend of the program, Adam Thielen to chat about his season, his new gym, and much more (23:06-37:11). Next, joining AJ is 2015 NFL DROY, 3x Pro Bowler, 4x All-Pro, CB for the Baltimore Ravens, Marcus Peters joins the show to chat about his season, style of play, how he likes to talk shit, dancing on the Titans logo, and almost burning down Marshawn Lynch's house (38:43-1:05:47). Later, Pat and AJ welcome in NASCAR Cup series driver Ty Dillon to chat about everything going on in NASCAR and tries to educate everyone about the sport as things start to heat up in their season (1:07:10-1:37:07). Make sure you subscribe to youtube.com/thepatmcafeeshow and listen every day on Mad Dog Radio, Sirius XM Channel 82. We appreciate you all for listening, come and laugh with us, cheers.
dc:creator: Pat McAfee
